segments.text: Decent dressing and appearance , which contribute to a good first impression of the interviewer , are surely quite important .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Generally speaking , dressing should be tidy and neat , and match well with your identity , age , and experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever you wear , it should perfectly reflect your confidence and vitality
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Professional suits may be the best choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gentlemen should wear western-style suits in the interview , which will help you look handsome .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ladies should wear professional suits , either classical style or free style . It would be appropriate to wear a little or no make-up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But those fashionable and shiny clothes should be avoided .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Name brand is not necessary . Anything decent will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should present the best of yourself in order to achieve success in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only when you dressing keep in accordance with that of other people around can you feel harmonious and relaxed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In a word , dressing and appearance are indeed important , but it should never be all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In other words , too much emphasis on it is undoubtedly to neglect the essentials .
segments.speaker: S2
